original_title: Lethal: En vivo... a través de los años
overview: Lethal, fundamental band of Argentine thrash metal that, 25 years after its founding, continues to write an unmissable legend after having separated twice and re-assembled as many times. The last chapter is "Live ... through the years", a highly technical record that endorses his performance for the first time. Recorded live at the Teatro Colegiales in Buenos Aires, on 3rd September, 2011.
title: Lethal: En vivo... a través de los años
